00032  * lustre/ofd/ofd_trans.c
00033  *
00034  * This file provides functions for OBD Filter Device (OFD) transaction
00035  * management.
00036  *
00037  * Author: Alex Zhuravlev <alexey.zhuravlev@intel.com>
00038  * Author: Mikhail Pershin <mike.pershin@intel.com>
00039  */
00040 
00041 #define DEBUG_SUBSYSTEM S_FILTER
00042 
00043 #include "ofd_internal.h"
00044 
00057 struct thandle *ofd_trans_create(const struct lu_env *env,
00058                                  struct ofd_device *ofd)
00059 {
00060         struct ofd_thread_info  *info = ofd_info(env);
00061         struct thandle          *th;
00062 
00063         LASSERT(info);
00064 
00065         th = dt_trans_create(env, ofd->ofd_osd);
00066         if (IS_ERR(th))
00067                 return th;
00068 
00069         /* export can require sync operations */
00070         if (info->fti_exp != NULL)
00071                 th->th_sync |= info->fti_exp->exp_need_sync;
00072         return th;
00073 }
00074 
00089 int ofd_trans_start(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd,
00090                     struct ofd_object *obj, struct thandle *th)
00091 {
00092         /* version change is required for this object */
00093         if (obj != NULL)
00094                 tgt_vbr_obj_set(env, ofd_object_child(obj));
00095 
00096         return dt_trans_start(env, ofd->ofd_osd, th);
00097 }
00098 
00110 void ofd_trans_stop(const struct lu_env *env, struct ofd_device *ofd,
00111                     struct thandle *th, int rc)
00112 {
00113         th->th_result = rc;
00114         dt_trans_stop(env, ofd->ofd_osd, th);
00115 }
